Summary Note:
The RM met Gabriela Andrea Wyss at a yacht party in Zürich. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Gabriela Andrea Wyss is a 52 year old Portfolio Manager from Switzerland.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in her decision to join.
Family Background: Gabriela Andrea Wyss has been happily married to Hagenbuch since 1999. Gabriela and Hagenbuch have 1 child, named Florine.
Education Background:
Gabriela completed her secondary education at Lycée cantonal de Porrentruy Jura in 1990.
She then attended University of Zurich, which she graduated in 1997.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 29 years, Gabriela Andrea Wyss has established herself as a key player in the industry.
Gabriela Andrea Wyss launched her career as a Stockbroker at Julius Baer Asset Management, where she gained valuable experience from 1996 to 1999.
Her subsequent role was as a Portfolio Manager at Julius Baer Asset Management, where she continued to grow professionally from 2000 till now.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 670000 CHF, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
Her remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Lucerne, Brugg and Solothurn, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.

Following the passing of her mother, a successful Tech Entrepreneur, she received an inheritance of 2190000 CHF in 2015, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
